::The Bodicons/Skullgrin/Triggerhappy/Symphony/Orchestra
/Composer::

Gutcl=
aw covered his eyes as he was blinded by the flash Angel Prime made.  Explo=
body also covered his eyes.

    "That coward!  He's getting away!" Gutclaw=
 hissed.

     Explobody transformed into his mechanical bird mode, and fle=
w up, blinded by the light.  From the launchers under his wings, he fired t=
wo missiles at Angel Prime, barely able to aim them good.  Gutclaw continue=
d to cover his eyes in pain.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  =
   Decapitron went to where Motormaster was, and Legtrap and Headshot follo=
wed.  However, they heard the emergency alarm, and were informed of an esca=
ping prisoner.

     "We'll get 'im!!" Decapitron, Legtrap and Headshot all=
 said at the same time.

     The three ran out instantly, and saw in the d=
istance Switchblade(I think) chasing Condor.  The prisoner, Condor, was abo=
ut to leave the area.  

     "Quick, let's follow him!" Decapitron said, t=
ransforming into car mode, a sleek, black viper, and speeding off towards C=
ondor.  

      Legtrap quickly jumped inside of Decapitron.

      "Let's =
catch up, then I can trap the prisoner with one of my traps!" He said.

   =
   Headshot jumped into Decapitron as well, sitting in the passenger seat.
=

      "Ya, and I can also attempt to snipe him down, with a well-aimed sho=
t, very well aimed, to the head," He said.

        Decapitron speeded off =
in car mode, to try and catch up to Condor.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~
       Skullgrin was blinded by the light.  He transformed int=
o tank mode, and fired two shrapnel blasts up in the air, hoping to hit Ang=
el Prime.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Triggerhappy wa=
s blinded, but he transformed into jet mode, and flew up, then fired 2 phot=
on cannon blasts at Angel Prime, although he couldn't see well.
~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Symphony went back inside the CF.  H=
e walked around, then went into the control room.  He looked around.

     =
 "Hmm," He said.

      Symphony sat down, then he fell asleep, his head ma=
shing a screen(or two) and some buttons.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~
       Orchestra couldn't fight.  He wasn't motivated enough.

  =
     "I'm outta here," He muttered to himself, flying off full speed to the=
 BlackFortress.

       Once he arrived, he landed and went inside.  The fi=
rst thing he wanted to know, was if Blacknightmare was still here.  He walk=
ed around, then he decided to send a message to Blacknightmare's comlink.

=
        "Blacknightmare, this is Orchestra, I'm back from battle, I think D=
arkfate went somewhere," He said.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~
      Composer was bored.  He wanted to do something.

      "Hey, Wheel=
jack, anything on those weapons?  Hows about we speak to Zardus?"
